description: This dashboard will provide JVM metrics for a Java application instrumented with Jolokia Agent.

targets.query: SELECT mean("heap_memory_usage_init") FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("heap_memory_usage_init") FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("EC2_IPADDRESS" =~ /^$IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference("CollectionCount") FROM "jvm_garbage_collector" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT difference("CollectionTime") FROM "jvm_garbage_collector" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT derivative(mean("bytesReceived"), 1s) FROM "connectors_http" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytesSent"), 1s) FROM "connectors_http" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("requestCount"), 1s) FROM "connectors_http" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "jolokia_agent_url" =~ /^$URL$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM OperatingSystem WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: URL
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM jvm_runtime WITH KEY = "jolokia_agent_url" WHERE "host"=~/^$hostname$/

title: JVM Metrics - JBoss
